question.prompt: My teacher said, "I am very proud of your progress." What is the correct reported speech?

options.label: My teacher said she was very proud of my progress.
My teacher said she is very proud of my progress.
My teacher said she has been very proud of my progress.
My teacher said she will be very proud of my progress.

hint: Khi động từ tường thuật ở thì quá khứ (said), thì hiện tại đơn (am) phải lùi về thì quá khứ đơn (was).

question.prompt: An told me, "I will call you tomorrow." How would you report this?

options.label: An told me that he will call me the next day.
An told me that he would call me tomorrow.
An told me that he would call me the next day.
An told me that he will call me tomorrow.

hint: Trong câu tường thuật, 'will' được lùi về 'would' và trạng từ chỉ thời gian 'tomorrow' được đổi thành 'the next day'.

question.prompt: She said, "I have already finished my homework." What did she say?

options.label: She said that she has already finished her homework.
She said that she had already finished her homework.
She said that she already finished her homework.
She said that she was already finishing her homework.

hint: Thì hiện tại hoàn thành (have finished) được lùi về thì quá khứ hoàn thành (had finished) trong lời nói gián tiếp.

question.prompt: He asked, "Where did you go last night?" How do you report his question?

options.label: He asked me where I had gone the night before.
He asked me where did I go the night before.
He asked me where I went last night.
He asked me where had I gone the night before.

hint: Trong câu hỏi tường thuật, thì quá khứ đơn (did go) lùi về quá khứ hoàn thành (had gone), 'last night' đổi thành 'the night before', và không đảo ngữ.

question.prompt: The science teacher explained, "Water boils at 100 degrees Celsius." What did the teacher explain?

options.label: The teacher explained that water boiled at 100 degrees Celsius.
The teacher explained that water had boiled at 100 degrees Celsius.
The teacher explained that water boils at 100 degrees Celsius.
The teacher explained that water was boiling at 100 degrees Celsius.

hint: Khi tường thuật một sự thật hiển nhiên hoặc một chân lý khoa học, chúng ta không cần lùi thì của động từ.

question.prompt: My mother told me, "You must clean your room now." How would you report this?

options.label: My mother told me that I must clean my room then.
My mother told me that I had to clean my room then.
My mother told me that I have to clean my room now.
My mother told me that I must clean my room now.

hint: Trong câu tường thuật, 'must' để chỉ sự bắt buộc thường được đổi thành 'had to', và 'now' được đổi thành 'then'.

question.prompt: He said, "I was studying when the phone rang." What is the correct reported speech?

options.label: He said that he was studying when the phone had rung.
He said that he had been studying when the phone rang.
He said that he studied when the phone was ringing.
He said that he has been studying when the phone rang.

hint: Thì quá khứ tiếp diễn (was studying) được lùi về thì quá khứ hoàn thành tiếp diễn (had been studying) trong lời nói gián tiếp.

question.prompt: She said, "I can't find my keys." How do you report this?

options.label: She said that she can't find her keys.
She said that she couldn't find her keys.
She said that she hasn't found her keys.
She said that she won't find her keys.

hint: Động từ khuyết thiếu 'can't' được lùi về 'couldn't' trong câu tường thuật.

question.prompt: They said, "We are going to the cinema this evening." What did they say?

options.label: They said they were going to the cinema that evening.
They said they are going to the cinema this evening.
They said they were going to the cinema this evening.
They said they had gone to the cinema that evening.

hint: Thì hiện tại tiếp diễn (are going) lùi về quá khứ tiếp diễn (were going), và 'this evening' đổi thành 'that evening'.

question.prompt: The student complained, "This exercise is too difficult." What did the student complain about?

options.label: The student complained that this exercise was too difficult.
The student complained that that exercise is too difficult.
The student complained that that exercise was too difficult.
The student complained that this exercise is too difficult.

hint: Trong câu tường thuật, thì hiện tại đơn (is) lùi về quá khứ đơn (was), và từ chỉ định 'this' đổi thành 'that'.
